name: Hidden Fortress
Text: 'Deploy on table (only at start of game) with up to three systems from outside your deck face-down under here.  If non-[Virtual Block 4] Hidden Base on table: Once per game, may deploy a system from here and/or exchange Hidden Base indicator with a system (from parsec 1 to 8) under here. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
